__e: Oh, you know how you said you didn't know how to be a hero without the darkness?
Friends? But you always said you'd never make friends with girls
But I think the truth of it is,I... Was scared you'd say no.
And you said you'd like to have ball lightning at your wedding.
You always told me that you liked the people there better.
Remember how you said... you'd like two women in the house?
That's what you said parents are supposed to do, right?
You told me that we have to love people for what they are, not for what they should be.
So the whole time the sister you said resembled me was a dog? Woof woof, a dog?
All your claims about doing what's best for the timeline, about protecting history, and it all comes down to cold blooded murder.
Now, George, the last time you were here, you were telling me about something that bothered you very much.
What about all that stuff you said about waiting till morning and watching the sunrise?
All the time you were down here, you told yourself that?
Is what you say You always said that to me.
Doesn't it sound funny, me saying that to you... when you've always said it to me?
Like all terrible things you said about me... that's not how you really feel.
And what you were saying about how women feel they have to starve themselves makes so much sense.
All of a sudden I was just thinking about everything you've been saying... about how strong we are, and how we can handle it.
I know, but you didn't really mean it.
I figured you didn't mean it, but if you did, then...
And your mum knows that you didn't mean it.
That's not what you were saying at the settlement meeting.
Just like you were saying in class, all it takes is one mistake.
Of course not, I was a teenage boy in a house full of girls.
When you were telling my mom how perfect I am...
Why don't you say to me what you were saying to her?
I really believed you when you said you weren't into him, because that's what you told everyone all the time.
